about.storyIntro: Surmedania is a dance platform founded by Angela Kaur, with the dream of building a space where everyone can learn Bhangra ‚Äî from the true basics to advanced levels.
about.founderBio: Our vision is to make Punjabi dance accessible to everyone, no matter their age or experience. Through Surmedania, we aim to spread joy, confidence, and cultural pride ‚Äî one beat at a time.
about.philosophyText: At Surmedania, we celebrate movement, tradition, and community. Whether you‚Äôre joining to stay active, connect with your roots, or simply have fun, you‚Äôll find a welcoming environment full of energy, laughter, and rhythm.

faq.q1: Who can join Surmedania Dance School?
faq.q6: What if I am a parent or family member?
faq.q7: Can I switch between classes or packages?
faq.qBook: Can I book Surmedania for private functions?
faq.h1Intro: Find answers to common questions about our classes, membership, and practical information. For additional inquiries, please contact us.
faq.ctaText: Contact us if you have more questions.
faq.a1: Everyone is welcome ‚Äî adults and children. No experience required.
faq.a2: Thursday 19:00‚Äì21:00 for adults. Sunday 15:00‚Äì17:00 for children.
faq.a3: All classes are at Ravinen in R√¶lingen. See our Classes page for address and map.
faq.a4: Active membership includes classes. Supported membership is for family and supporters. See the Registration page for pricing and payment options.
faq.a5: Register via the Registration page. Enter your details, choose your class time and membership type, then follow the payment instructions. You'll receive a confirmation once payment is processed.
faq.a6: Yes. Parents and family can register as supported members. To register a child, select 'Active Member' and choose the age group. Parents are welcome to observe classes and join our events.
faq.a7: Yes, contact us via email or feedback form to switch classes or adjust your membership. Changes depend on availability.
faq.a8: Free parking is available by Marikollen Kultursal and at the nearby football field parking. It's free when you register with the EasyPark app. See our Classes page for the full address and map.
faq.aWear: Wear comfortable workout clothes and socks (we dance without shoes). Avoid jeans. Bring water.
faq.aPerform: Yes, we regularly perform at cultural events and festivals. Members can participate in showcases and competitions. See our News & Events page for upcoming performances.
faq.aBook: Yes! We offer private dance lessons and performances for weddings, birthday parties, corporate events, and other special occasions. Contact us with your event details and we'll discuss a custom package.

faq.q1: Hvem kan bli med i Surmedania Dance School?
faq.q6: Hva om jeg er forelder eller familiemedlem?

faq.h1Intro: Finn svar p√• vanlige sp√∏rsm√•l om v√•re klasser, medlemskap og praktisk informasjon. For ytterligere henvendelser, vennligst kontakt oss.
faq.ctaText: Kontakt oss hvis du har flere sp√∏rsm√•l.
faq.a1: Alle er velkomne ‚Äî voksne og barn. Ingen forkunnskaper kreves.
faq.a2: Torsdag 19:00‚Äì21:00 for voksne. S√∏ndag 15:00‚Äì17:00 for barn.
faq.a3: Alle klasser er p√• Ravinen i R√¶lingen. Se Klasser-siden for veibeskrivelse og kart.
faq.a4: Aktivt medlemskap inkluderer klasser. St√∏ttemedlemskap er for familie og st√∏ttespillere. Se Registrering for priser og betalingsalternativer.
faq.a5: Registrer via siden Registrering. Fyll inn opplysningene dine, velg klassetid og medlemskapstype, og f√∏lg betalingsinstruksjonene. Du f√•r en bekreftelse n√•r betalingen er registrert.
faq.a6: Ja. Foreldre og familie kan registrere seg som st√∏ttemedlemmer. For √• registrere et barn, velg 'Aktivt medlem' og riktig aldersgruppe. Foreldre er velkomne til √• observere klasser og v√¶re med p√• arrangementer.
faq.a7: Ja, kontakt oss via e-post eller tilbakemeldingsskjema for √• bytte klasser eller justere medlemskapet. Endringer avhenger av tilgjengelighet.
faq.a8: Gratis parkering finnes ved Marikollen Kultursal og p√• parkeringsplassen ved fotballbanen i n√¶rheten. Det er gratis n√•r du registrerer i EasyPark-appen. Se Klasser-siden for full adresse og kart.
faq.aWear: Bruk komfortable treningskl√¶r og sokker (vi danser uten sko). Unng√• jeans. Ta med vann.
faq.aPerform: Ja, vi opptrer jevnlig p√• kulturelle arrangementer og festivaler. Medlemmer kan delta i oppvisninger og konkurranser. Se siden Nyheter og hendelser for kommende opptredener.
faq.aBook: Ja! Vi tilbyr private dansetimer og opptredener for bryllup, bursdagsfester, firmaarrangementer og andre spesielle anledninger. Kontakt oss med dine arrangementsdetaljer for en tilpasset pakke.
